user_stories.title: AI-Powered Image Generation
user_stories.story: As a digital artist, I want AI-powered image generation that can create high-quality artwork based on text descriptions and style references so that I can quickly generate concept art and explore creative ideas.
acceptance_criteria: Generate images from text prompts with high quality
Support multiple art styles and techniques
Allow style transfer and reference image usage
Provide batch generation for multiple variations
Export in multiple formats (PNG, JPG, PSD)

user_stories.title: Automated Image Editing
user_stories.story: As a photo editor, I want automated image editing that can enhance photos, remove backgrounds, and apply professional effects so that I can process large batches of images efficiently.
acceptance_criteria: Automatically enhance image quality and lighting

user_stories.title: Creative Asset Management
user_stories.story: As an art director, I want intelligent asset management that can organize, tag, and search through creative assets so that I can quickly find and reuse artwork across projects.
acceptance_criteria: Automatically tag images with AI-generated descriptions
Organize assets by style, color, and content

user_stories.title: Style Consistency Checker
user_stories.story: As a brand designer, I want a style consistency checker that can analyze artwork and ensure it matches brand guidelines so that I can maintain visual consistency across all brand assets.
acceptance_criteria: Analyze color palettes and brand compliance

user_stories.title: Automated Social Media Graphics
user_stories.story: As a social media manager, I want automated graphic generation that can create platform-optimized images for different social media channels so that I can maintain consistent posting schedules.
acceptance_criteria: Generate graphics for multiple social platforms
